title: Ep98 Crimes that Inspired Musicals
description: This week, the gals get out their pitch pipes and explore some crimes so intense that they sparked song and dance numbers. Cases include a couple of tabloid-hungry flappers, a conviction that fueled Southern antisemitism, and a meat pie alibi. Pop open a bottle of Winc's Wall of Sound Red Blend, put on your dancin' shoes, and tune in for Crimes that Inspired Musicals.    This ep is supported by TalkSpace. Get $45 off your 1st month at www.talkspace.com/gals
